title: Tri
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Mostly vegan restaurant with raw food options. Uses real cow cheese in a couple dishes. Although menu denotes vegan options, some items may be labelled wrong. Offers salads, soups, specialty dishes, sometimes a buffet, and juice / smoothies. Vegan pastries are available. Outdoor patio in good weather. Also is a creative family center with workshops offered.
